name: Holy Shift!
description:
Holy Shift! is a building game in which you try to balance a hotel on the very tip of a mountain. Be careful! If you don't distribute the weight of the Angels and Devils well enough, the hotel may fall over and the balance between Hell and Heaven may be broken!

This game was made in two days, as a submission in the Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

Drag to select guests, click to move selected guests to location.

Build by selecting a piece and clicking on the hotel.

Music by Pix:

Game made by:

Berend Driessens           HIGHSCORE:  113

Guus Knol                         HIGHSCORE:  76

Dion Peek                         HIGHSCORE:  69 (nice)

Thanks for checking out our game!
